contents: Article 5 (Organization) ① The types of sports organizations that join as members of the city/provincial sports council and become member organizations are as follows. Revised 2022. 5. 10., 2023. 7. 5. 1. City/provincial sports organizations: Organizations established for the purpose of activities and projects for specific sports in the relevant region 2. City/county/district sports associations: 「National Sports Promotion Act 」 A sports association established with the approval of the head of the competent local government pursuant to Article 33-2. Revised on May 15, 2017, October 6, 2021, and May 10, 2022. ② The classification of member organizations under paragraph 1 is as follows. 1. ‘Regular member organization’ refers to an organization that has confirmed its membership through a resolution of the board of directors of the city/provincial sports association and a general meeting of delegates (hereinafter referred to as *general meeting). 2. ‘Associate member organization’ refers to an organization that has confirmed its membership through a resolution by the board of directors of the city/provincial sports association. 3. ‘Recognized organization’ refers to an organization whose representativeness is temporarily recognized by resolution of the city/provincial sports association board of directors, but to which rights and obligations are not applied. ③ Deleted 2021. 10. 6. ④ Member qualification requirements according to the classification in paragraph 2 shall be determined separately in consideration of the size and function of the sports organization. Newly established 2021. 10. 6.
